task.title: Remove Typewriter Paper
task.shortdesc: You can remove typing paper from your typewriter by opening your paper bail and activating your paper release lever.

step.cmd: Pull back your paper bail to an open position, so that the paper bail's pressure is released from the paper.

step.note: Over time, removing typing paper from your typewriter without activating the paper release lever will damage the internal mechanisms.
step.cmd: Pull back the paper release lever.
Roll the platen knob forward until the existing sheet of paper is fully removed.
